Solution:   Skip over linebreak. (closes #7407)

patch 8.2.2078: illegal memory access when using :print on invalid text

Problem:    Illegal memory access when using :print on invalid text. (Dhiraj
            Mishra)
Solution:   Check for more composing characters than supported. (closes #7399)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/c478ee3d83fab0dba46740f2023c35f743f88316|patch 8.2.2076: MS-Windows console: sometimes drops typed characters>
patch 8.2.2076: MS-Windows console: sometimes drops typed characters

Problem:    MS-Windows console: sometimes drops typed characters.
Solution:   Do not wait longer than 10 msec for input. (issue #7164)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2076: MS-Windows console: sometimes drops typed characters · vim/vim@c478ee3
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2076: MS-Windows console: sometimes drops typed characters · vim/vim@c478ee3
attachments.text: Problem: MS-Windows console: sometimes drops typed characters. Solution: Do not wait longer than 10 msec for input. (issue #7164)

patch 8.2.2075: error for const argument to mapnew()

Solution:   Don't give an error. (closes #7400)

patch 8.2.2074: Vim9: using :normal from Vim9 script can't handle range

Problem:    Vim9: using :normal from Vim9 script can't handle range.
Solution:   Execute a :normal command in legacy script context. (closes #7401)

attachments.title: patch 8.2.2074: Vim9: using :normal from Vim9 script can't handle range · vim/vim@4324d87
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: using :normal from Vim9 script can't handle range. Solution: Execute a :normal command in legacy script context. (closes #7401)

text:

patch 8.2.2073: Vim9: for with unpack only works for local variables

Problem:    Vim9: for with unpack only works for local variables.
Solution:   Recognize different destinations.

attachments.title: patch 8.2.2073: Vim9: for with unpack only works for local variables · vim/vim@4b8a065
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: for with unpack only works for local variables. Solution: Recognize different destinations.
